column4: Using Kubuntu 10.04 with no network problems till yesterday, then suddenly won't autoconnect to network via wifi or ethernet. KNetworkManager says "connections unmanaged", can't access right-click menu. Tried "sudo dhclient" which will connect ok for a few minutes ("ping www.google.com" is ok), then it silently loses connection ("ping www.google.com" is 100% packet loss) although still able...
...to ping router (DD-WRT Linksys 54GL). Doubt router problem since other computers connecting ok, including this WinXP laptop I'm using.
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
not intentional. ChatZilla automatically put the "Enter".  You should be better programmed.
